translation.en: [man] Just when you think it's all over,
translation.de: Gerade als du denkst, es sei alles vorbei,

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.de: werden deine Familie und du von etwas Schrecklichem verfolgt.

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood, and disappears into thin air.
translation.de: Und nachdem es deine Schwester Jenny kaltblütig ermordet hat, verschwindet es.

translation.en: But a clue left behind leads us here,
to this club in Bangkok.
And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.de: Deshalb brauchen wir den Wu Assassin noch.

translation.en: [woman] What's a Wu Assassin?
[man] All right. So about a year ago, my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.de: Vor etwa einem Jahr lebten meine Freunde und ich ein gutes Leben in San Francisco.

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
translation.de: Jenny und ich hatten ein Restaurant,

translation.en: and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.de: und mein Kumpel Lu Xin vertickte Autos,

translation.en: until she showed up.
A 10,000-year-old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.de: Ein zehntausend Jahre alter Kriegergeist, der auf die Erde geholt wurde.

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.de: Dann gab sie meinem besten Freund Kai ihre Kräfte.

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever. What, like The Avengers?
translation.de: -Er wurde zum jetzigen Wu Assassin. Egal. -So was wie The Avengers?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Hmm. -But Asian. -Hmm.
Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
translation.de: Nein. Eher wie diese Serie aus den Siebzigern.

translation.en: Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.de: Kai und Lu Xin sind die Engel. Ich bin Charlie.

translation.en: So what kind of mission?
translation.de: Was für eine Art von Mission?

translation.en: Um, it's a supernatural one.
Sounds dangerous.
[man] It's what we do.
-[man 2] You seeing this? -[man 3] You know why we're here.
translation.de: Sie wissen, dass wir da sind.

translation.en: So your friend Kai…
translation.de: -Und dein Freund Kai… -Was ist mit ihm?

translation.en: -What about him? -This Wu Assassin.
translation.de: -Und dein Freund Kai… -Was ist mit ihm? Dieser Wu Assassin. Er muss irgendwelche Kräfte haben, oder?

translation.en: He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
translation.de: Dieser Wu Assassin. Er muss irgendwelche Kräfte haben, oder?

translation.en: [man] He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
translation.de: Er hat die Kraft des Dao. Er ist schneller und stärker als jeder andere Mensch.

translation.en: He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.de: Er hat die Kraft des Dao. Er ist schneller und stärker als jeder andere Mensch. -Nennt sich Instrument des Todes. -Und der andere?

translation.en: And your other friend?
translation.de: -Nennt sich Instrument des Todes. -Und der andere?

translation.en: Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
translation.de: Der ist einfach nur gut im Kämpfen.

translation.en: So why aren't you with them?
This seems more dangerous.
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else? Hell, yeah.
translation.de: -Lust, mir den Rest woanders zu erzählen? -Na klar.

translation.en: What about your friends?
They'll be fine.
I think.
I fucking love Thailand.
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
translation.de: Warum Bangkok? Ich meine, was gibt es hier?

translation.en: Answers.
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.de: Ich habe diese Materie bis nach Thailand zurückverfolgt.

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
translation.de: Sie stammt von einem uralten Gesteinsstück.

translation.en: Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
translation.de: Kai! Da oben! Er verwandelt sie.

translation.en: Chi vampire.
-What's so special about this? -[scoffs]
[man] I found it in my dead sister's hand.
translation.de: Es lag in der Hand meiner Schwester.

translation.en: Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.de: Kai, Lu Xin und ich kamen zu unserem Familienrestaurant zurück,

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.de: und sie lag da einfach so tot auf dem Boden.

translation.en: Well, here's to your sister.
You want to know a secret? Sure.
[whispering] Come here.
I don't drink anymore.
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
translation.de: Das macht einen Jiangshi aus dir, oder?

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
Who killed Jenny? [grunting]
Who killed my sister?
-Kai! -[grunting]
-He's not talking! -Ah! [grunts]
Assassin's strike.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.de: Yo. Hey! Was soll das? Drück den Startknopf.

translation.en: This isn't me.
It's me. I need your help.
translation.de: Ich bin es. Ich brauche deine Hilfe.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] You? Who are you?
[man's voice] No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long. It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
translation.de: Ich kann es nicht lange aufrecht erhalten. Es ist gefährlich für mich.

translation.en: What do you want?
[man's voice] Not here.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.de: Es gibt viel zu bereden, Wu Assassin.

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.de: Diesen Club werde ich nie wieder besuchen.

translation.en: -Who was that? -We should call Tommy.
[Tommy] Stop the van!
Yeah. She didn't know anything.
What about your Jiangshi?
I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.de: Es gibt kaum was über ihn. Dieses Gebäude gehört ihm.

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
translation.de: Wir fallen einfach so in sein Revier ein?

translation.en: If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.de: Wenn es uns zu Jennys Mörder führt, dann ja.

translation.en: Looks shady as fuck.
[Tommy] It should be up on the right.
Guessing he's not the valet.
[narrator] Since founding his firm in 1999,
translation.de: Seit Gründung seiner Firma im Jahr 1999 bietet William Pan

translation.en: William Pan has formed collaboration agreements
translation.de: Seit Gründung seiner Firma im Jahr 1999 bietet William Pan durch Kooperationsverträge mit weltweit führenden Konzernen

translation.en: with the world's largest companies.
translation.de: durch Kooperationsverträge mit weltweit führenden Konzernen

translation.en: Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.de: die komplexesten Probleme der Menschheit zu bewältigen.

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.de: Alles im Dienste von Williams einzigartiger Vision.

translation.en: One people,
one world,
one planet.
We're not just looking to the future…
translation.de: Wir blicken nicht nur in die Zukunft.

translation.en: we're looking to shape it.
Thank you for coming.
I know my message was unorthodox.
translation.de: Ich weiß, meine Botschaft war unorthodox.

translation.en: I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.de: Leider konnte ich nicht persönlich kommen. Die Kommunikation war schwierig.

translation.en: Do you know the story of Pan Gu? [Tommy] Yeah, we do.
translation.de: -Kennen Sie die Geschichte von Pan Gu? -Ja.

translation.en: The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.de: Der erste Mensch, der das Universum aus dem Nichts formte

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
translation.de: und Himmel, Erde und Meere schuf.

translation.en: We all went to Chinese school.
Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu after he became a god.
translation.de: Die lehren nicht, was mit Pan Gu geschah, als er ein Gott wurde.

translation.en: He went mad with power. Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.de: Er wurde krank vor Machtgier. Er wollte die Welt nach seinem Bild gestalten.

translation.en: But the Dao,
in its infinite celestial wisdom,
translation.de: rief in seiner unendlichen göttlichen Weisheit

translation.en: called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.de: den ersten Wu Assassin dazu auf, diesen ersten Mann zu Fall zu bringen.

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order. These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.de: Yin und Yang. Chaos und Ordnung. Eine jahrtausendealte Fehde der Geister.

translation.en: I'm not the first vessel.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht das erste Gefäß.

translation.en: But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.de: Aber dank Ihnen bin ich das letzte.

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced, chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.de: Da die Welt aus dem Gleichgewicht geriet, können das Chaos und ich Frieden finden.

translation.en: I was attacked. Barely made it out alive.
translation.de: Ich wurde angegriffen. Ich habe nur knapp überlebt.

translation.en: And that's why I've retreated here for safety, while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.de: Ich brachte mich hier in Sicherheit, während mein Zwilling Chaos verbreitet.

translation.en: Who is he?
She.
Yin and yang.
You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi. Queen of the Bangkok underworld.
translation.de: -Vielleicht kennen Sie sie. Ku An Qi. -Die Königin der Bangkoker Unterwelt.

translation.en: She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.de: Sie ist weltweit tätig. Schaltet jede Bedrohung aus.

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
translation.de: Sie verbraucht Chi, um ihre Macht zu stärken.

translation.en: The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.de: Die Shaolin in China. Die Druiden in Irland.

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.de: Und letzten Monat ging sie nach San Francisco.

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you, but your friend intervened.
translation.de: Ku An Qi hat Sie gesucht, aber Ihre Freundin griff ein.

translation.en: She fought valiantly.
But Ku cannot be stopped.
She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.de: Wenn keiner eingreift, wird sie weiter wüten.

translation.en: How do you know all this? [William] Because Ku and I are connected.
translation.de: -Woher wissen Sie das? -Ku und ich haben eine Verbindung.

translation.en: That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.de: Wenn ich mich ihr gegenüber öffne, wird sie kommen.

translation.en: Follow me.
This whole thing could be bullshit.
[William] In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.de: Bei dem Kampf nahm Ihre Schwester etwas von Ku an sich, einen Talisman.

translation.en: I have the other half.
I assume you have hers. What's it matter to you?
It's a piece of our Essence.
-She'll try to get it back. -Good. Send her my way.
In two days' time, my worse half
translation.de: In zwei Tagen trifft sie sich mit den Bossen der Fünf Triaden

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel,
translation.de: In zwei Tagen trifft sie sich mit den Bossen der Fünf Triaden im Hotel Vie, um ihre Machtbasis zu festigen.

translation.en: solidifying her power base.
translation.de: im Hotel Vie, um ihre Machtbasis zu festigen.

translation.en: Cameras everywhere, no weapons allowed.
-There's no honor in guns. -And won't she know what you're up to?
I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
translation.de: Ich verberge meine Gedanken vor ihr.

translation.en: My powers extend to the mind,
translation.de: Meine Kräfte erstrecken sich auf den Geist,

translation.en: while hers are focused on the body.
translation.de: während ihre auf den Körper gerichtet sind.

translation.en: A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
Hotel security, the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.de: Der Sicherheitsdienst, die fünf Bosse der Triaden und ihre gesamte Truppe.

translation.en: You know what? I got a better idea.
translation.de: Ich weiß was Besseres. Benutzen Sie Ihre Gedankenkontrolle.

translation.en: Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.de: Ich weiß was Besseres. Benutzen Sie Ihre Gedankenkontrolle. -Schicken Sie eine Armee. -Die kann ich nicht kontrollieren.

translation.en: [William] I can't control an army.
translation.de: -Schicken Sie eine Armee. -Die kann ich nicht kontrollieren.

translation.en: I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.de: Ich kann Kontakt aufnehmen, Gedanken kurz festhalten.

translation.en: -[Lu Xin sighs] -But that is the extent of my powers now.
translation.de: Aber das ist auch schon alles.

translation.en: Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.de: Nun, es scheint, als hätten Sie alle Antworten, aber die falschen.

translation.en: We're in.
When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman, and I'll take care of the rest.
translation.de: Wenn Sie Ku haben, bringen Sie sie mir mit dem Talisman. Ich erledige den Rest.

translation.en: No. You said the Dao is broken.
translation.de: Nein. Sie sagten, das Dao sei gebrochen.

translation.en: [William] Yes.
But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.de: Aber zusammen können wir es vielleicht wiederherstellen.

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
And I kill her.
[Lu Xin] The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.de: Ja, aber diese Person oder Halbgöttin hat Jenny ermordet.

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Deshalb müssen wir clever sein. Das Ganze betrachten.

translation.en: -Look at the pieces in front of us. -This isn't a game.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Deshalb müssen wir clever sein. Das Ganze betrachten. -Das ist kein Spiel. -Es ist ein Spiel.

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.de: -Das ist kein Spiel. -Es ist ein Spiel. Alles ist ein Spiel, Tommy.

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
translation.de: Wir haben die perfekte Gelegenheit. Nutzen wir sie.

translation.en: If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.de: Wenn du sterben willst, zieh mich nicht...

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
translation.de: Du tust so, als wäre dir Jenny egal!

translation.en: -[Lu Xin] That's the game. No one's safe. -[Tommy] Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.de: -Keiner ist hier sicher, Tommy. -Fick dich, Mann.

translation.en: -Yeah, fuck you too. -[Kai] Guys! Calm down.
I'm calm!
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.de: Ku An Qi will den Wu Assassin. Ich gebe ihr den Wu Assassin, allein.

translation.en: We're going together.
-No. -It might not be the smartest choice,
but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
translation.de: Aber es ist unsere einzige Chance.

translation.en: Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.de: Scheiß drauf. Nein. Ich mach das alleine.

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai? You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Du glaubst, du bist besser als wir, weil du deine Kräfte hast.

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
translation.de: Als ob wir nur eine Last wären.

translation.en: Lu Xin is calling his contact.
translation.de: Lu Xin ruft seinen Kontakt an.

translation.en: Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
translation.de: Kann er eine Panzerfaust für Ku besorgen?

translation.en: You never know, with magic.
But I guess this worked.
Let me show you something.
Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.de: Halte diesen Finger locker. Das macht es einfacher.

translation.en: Try that.
I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
translation.de: Ich komme mit. Ist mir egal, was du sagst.

translation.en: I have to go. Okay?
[Kai] Look, Tommy.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.de: Wenn du wütend wirst, kommst du um.

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
Anger.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
translation.de: Ich muss euer Sonnenbad leider unterbrechen.

translation.en: Bad news. [sighs] The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.de: Schlechte Nachrichten. Der Kerl von der Jiangshi-Mission hat mich blockiert.

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
Anyone else?
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi, they lose my number fast.
translation.de: Wenn die hören, dass es um Ku An Qi geht, verlieren sie meine Nummer.

translation.en: I might know someone crazy enough to help.
What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
translation.de: Seit wann hast du jemanden in Bangkok?

translation.en: I said "might." I'll hit her up.
translation.de: Ich sagte vielleicht. Ich rufe sie an.

translation.en: Something just doesn't feel right about this.
translation.de: Ich habe kein gutes Gefühl dabei.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Something smells good.
-Whoa,. -[Tommy] Thank you so much.
What's Preeya look like anyway?
Like that.
Hey! How are you?
-Hey! -It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with.
What's up, Thomas?
Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.de: Thomas? Warum treffen wir uns hier?

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
translation.de: Und es ist in aller Öffentlichkeit. Heutzutage

translation.en: too careful these days. You, I know.
translation.de: kann man nicht vorsichtig genug sein. Dich kenne ich.

translation.en: [inhales] Them…
-[grunts] -…don't know.
Oh shit.
[Tommy] Where are we going?
[Preeya] Ah, too many questions.
[man] You know who I work for? Interpol, police of the world.
translation.de: Weißt du, für wen ich arbeite? Interpol, die Weltpolizei.

translation.en: We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.de: Wir wissen, dass die Triade sich mit der Terroristin Ku An Qi trifft.

translation.en: When?
And where?
[whispers] Good luck.
That means, fuck off.
Both of you.
You wanna have fun?
The Vie Hotel, tomorrow.
You might wanna call in the cleaners. I thought he gave you the information.
translation.de: -Sie sollten die Reinigungsleute anrufen. -Er gab Ihnen die Informationen doch.

translation.en: The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.de: Die Textilreinigung. Er hat sich besudelt.

translation.en: [Tommy] Uh, Preeya, meet the boys.
Boys, this is, uh, Preeya.
'Sup. Lu Xin.
-Lu, is that a "Sin" or a "Xin"? -Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
-What's his problem? -Don't worry. He's cool.
translation.de: -Was hat der? -Keine Sorge. Er ist ok.

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.
-[Kai, in Thai] Hello. -[in Thai] Hello.
[in English] See? Someone's got manners.
-Where's your sister? -Oh, she's not here.
That's too bad. I love Jen.
Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.de: Jedenfalls habe ich gehört, dass ihr auf Selbstmordmission seid.

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
translation.de: -Du hast es ihr gesagt? -Sonst hätte sie nicht geholfen.

translation.en: It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.de: -Du hast es ihr gesagt? -Sonst hätte sie nicht geholfen. -Sie weiß alles. -Ich will wissen, was mich erwartet.

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
translation.de: -Sie weiß alles. -Ich will wissen, was mich erwartet.

translation.en: Due diligence. If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.de: -Ich informiere mich. -Wenn du es weißt, warum hilfst du dann?

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.de: Ich habe nichts gegen Action. Gehört zum Job.

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying. She needs to be stopped.
translation.de: Diese Frau ist kein Spaß. Viele Tote. Sie muss aufgehalten werden.

translation.en: Can you get this?
Let me make some calls.
Enjoy your shopping, boys.
Keep your mouth shut.
Shopping?
The fuck?
-[Tommy] Thank you. -[Lu Xin speaking Thai]
-[Kai] Tommy? -Yeah.
translation.de: Tommy? -Ja. -Woher kennst du sie noch mal?

translation.en: How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.de: Vor ich vor fünf Jahren hier war, stahl jemand meinen Louis-V-Rucksack.

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything. So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.de: Brieftasche, Pass und Handy, alles weg. Die Polizei hat nichts unternommen.

translation.en: -So, someone told me to go talk to-- -Uh.
translation.de: Jemand sagte mir, ich solle mit Pree…

translation.en: I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet, in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
translation.de: Ich erzähle die Kurzfassung, falls wir es je wieder hören müssen.

translation.en: He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.de: Er wurde bestohlen und weiß nichts über sie.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
translation.de: Sie ist unser einziger Kontakt. Wir brauchen sie.

translation.en: -We need this. -[Preeya] And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.de: Sie ist unser einziger Kontakt. Wir brauchen sie. Ihr müsst euch mit mir zufriedengeben.

translation.en: -[Tommy] Did you get it? -[Preeya] Yes, every goddamn thing.
-[Tommy] See? -[sniffs]
Thank you!
Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.de: Hört mal. Ich weiß, es geht mich nichts an.

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.de: Aber ich mag den hier, und ich muss euch sagen, euer Plan...

translation.en: Is none of your business.
Relax, big guy.
-[chuckles] -[Preeya] We're on the same team.
There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.de: Ihr kriegt diese Waffen niemals ins Hotel Vie.

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.de: Es ist gut bewacht. Der einzige Zugang ist der Haupteingang.

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.de: Gefällt mir nicht. Wir müssen umdenken.

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.de: Nein. Wir jagen Jennys Killer morgen gemeinsam.

translation.en: Hey! Yo!
Jen's dead?
Uh, yeah. Our target took her out. Now it's our turn.
translation.de: Ja. Unsere Zielperson hat sie getötet. Jetzt sind wir dran.

translation.en: Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I can help you get in.
It's dangerous.
I know.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.de: Die Sicherheitsvorkehrungen sind streng. Das nutzen wir zu unserem Vorteil.

translation.en: We?
[Preeya] Morning, boys.
Hey. Thanks.
Is this your idea of a joke?
Trust me.
This is 007 shit.
We're good.
Okay. Be careful with these.
[Preeya] Wow. What's so special about them?
translation.de: Warum? Was ist daran so besonders?

translation.en: -Magic. -Come on. Let's go.
We're gonna get justice for her.
[Lu Xin] What do you think?
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
Come on.
[Tommy] Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
Goddamn!
[Preeya] A bit much, isn't it?
Are you guys seeing this?
[scoffs] Looks like a dipshit nobody.
[Tommy] Ah.
[guard 2] Get up.
-All right. Easy. Easy. -[Tommy] Can I talk to your manager?
Hey, we're just on holiday.
-[Preeya grunts] -[Tommy] We're valued customers.
One-star Yelp review on the way!
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.de: Das übernimmt der Sicherheitsdienst. Konzentrieren Sie sich...

translation.en: [in Thai] Why are you here?
You're wasting your time. It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.de: Vergessen Sie's. Die sind für Songkran, das thailändische Wasserfest.

translation.en: That's not until April. Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
translation.de: -Das ist erst im April. -Wir sind gerne gut vorbereitet.

translation.en: Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag. You for real?
translation.de: -Packen Sie es in ihre Tasche. -Ist das Ihr Ernst?

translation.en: [Tommy] Yes, I'm for real.
-[guard] Bullshit! -[Tommy] Look at all this mess.
Stay here.
[man, in French] What's going on?
[in English] Where is our fucking visual?
-I'm working on it. -[Zulu] Our gear is still working.
Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.de: Es scheint nur das Hotel zu betreffen.

translation.en: Something is going down.
This is not good.
-[sighs] -[man] Zulu! Zulu!
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] You are my men now.
-Close your eyes. -What?
Just close your eyes.
-Trust me. -[guard] Come on!
Come on. Let's get out of here.
-[elevator dings] -See you in a second.
[guard] Stop!
-Good timing. -Yeah. Of course it is.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
translation.de: Scheiße. Wer zum Teufel war das?

translation.en: -[Zulu] Hands where I can see 'em. -[gun cocks]
What are you doing here?
-[Kai] You know her? -Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.de: Ich vertickte Aston Martins. Meine Brokerin kam also von Interpol.

translation.en: -Look, hey, these bodies-- -Get down on your knees!
This wasn't us. So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.de: -Das waren wir nicht. -Ihr schaut nur vorbei, was?

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.de: Zama, du kennst mich. Traust du mir so was zu?

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
translation.de: So gut kenne ich dich nicht.

translation.en: This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.de: Das ist größer und komplizierter, als du ahnst.

translation.en: Try me. The fate of the world.
-I didn't come to fuck around. -Don't!
Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.de: Ich habe zwei Verdächtige. Brauche Verstärkung.

translation.en: Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.de: Sie haben wahrscheinlich auch dein Team.

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, -and get down on the floor. -[chuckling]
translation.de: Finger hinterm Kopf verschränken und auf den Boden legen.

translation.en: -I don't want to hurt you. -Kai. Don't.
Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.de: Hör auf ihn. Er scheint der Vernünftige zu sein.

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.de: Höre ich zum ersten Mal. Waffe runter.

translation.en: -What the fuck happened here? -We're working on it.
Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.de: Lass sie los. Sie ist nicht die Gefahr.

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.de: Es ist klar, dass wir nicht die Bösen sind.

translation.en: But they are coming.
[exhales] Who's coming? The entire hotel.
[Lu Xin] On your six!
-I got it. -I'm just looking out for you.
-Because that's always been your MO. -Here we go again. You could just say sorry.
translation.de: -Das ist ja dein Ding. -Mann. Entschuldige dich einfach.

translation.en: -[Zulu] What? [laughing] -Sorry works just fine.
[Preeya] Did you guys, like, used to date or--
-No! -No!
Why are you here?
[Zan] They offered me a deal. The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.de: Sie boten mir einen Deal an. Den Wu Assassin im Tausch gegen Macht.

translation.en: [Tommy] Where we going?
-Fuck. Come with me -Go!
[Lu Xin] Shit!
Fuck! Get in the car!
Looks like you're not the only special one.
translation.de: Du bist nicht der einzige Besondere.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Look out!
[Tommy] Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
[grunts] Fuck.
[Tommy] It's locked!
Go!
Door says push, not pull.
What?
Hold up. Where's Kai?
Don't worry about Kai, all right?
translation.de: Mach dir keine Sorgen um Kai.

translation.en: Oh shit. You okay?
Yo, you good?
-[Lu Xin] Yo, we gotta go. Come on. -My van's still here. Come on!
translation.de: -Wir müssen los. -Mein Van ist noch da. Los!

translation.en: Get in.
-[Lu Xin] What happened back there? -What happened in here?
This is chaotic. You know what to do.
translation.de: Das ist chaotisch. Du weißt, was zu tun ist.

translation.en: If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy. We didn't have another lead.
translation.de: -Ich sagte dir ja, dass da etwas faul ist. -Wir hatten keine andere Spur.

translation.en: [in Thai] Take them down.
Get me out of here now.
-[in English] Shit. -What?
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
-Hold tight. -[brakes screeching]
Can you get to Khaosan Road? -We have another safe house there. -Yeah.
translation.de: -Fahr zum Safe House in der Khaosan Road. -Ja.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Shit.
[Zulu] It's the end of the road.
Shit.
[man] Get out of the car!
-She's locking down the city. -What are we gonna do?
Sail away. I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.de: Wir nehmen ein Boot auf dem Chao Phraya.

translation.en: That plan is just--
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] Stop firing. Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
translation.de: Feuer einstellen. Holt sie aus dem Wagen und bringt sie mir.

translation.en: [in English] I changed my mind. I like the plan.
[Tommy] Yeah. River, boat.
-If you wanna join me, guns are up top. -[Preeya] Come on.
translation.de: Wenn ihr mitmachen wollt, Waffen sind oben. Na los.

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
translation.de: Seht euch das an. Die machen wir alle!

translation.en: Ah, fuck. I'm all out.
[Lu Xin] They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
translation.de: Sie wollen uns lebendig verbrennen. Raus!

translation.en: [Zulu] Okay. Everybody, follow me.
[man] Hey!
Hey. Hey.
♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
translation.de: Hey, Leute. Können wir das ausdiskutieren?

translation.en: Yo, what's up?
-♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ -Good timing.
Never seen that before. I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.de: -Das war neu. -Hab dazugelernt, seit du abgehauen bist.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.de: Wenn ich geblieben wäre, dann nur hinter Gittern.

translation.en: This way. The river.
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[Preeya] Get to the boat!
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[in Thai] Get off my boat!
[Lu Xin] Kai! Look out!
-[Lu Xin] Go, go! -[boat engine accelerating]
-[Kai] Get us out of here! -[Tommy] Come on!
Hurry, they're catching up!
[Lu Xin] Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
translation.de: Wir sind fast da. Es ist gleich da vorne.

translation.en: [man] Ah, Preeya! [in Thai] You are back.
translation.de: Preeya! Du kommst ja doch zurück.

translation.en: I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
[Tommy, in English] Everyone's excited to see you.
translation.de: Alle freuen sich, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: So this is your home.
-It's been a while since I was last here. -[Tommy] What about your family?
translation.de: -Ich war schon lange nicht mehr hier. -Und deine Familie?

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
What's this?
Magical protection. If they don't want you, you can't pass.
translation.de: Magischer Schutz. Wenn sie dich nicht wollen, kannst du nicht durch.

translation.en: I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
translation.de: Das ist das Haus eines Schamanen.

translation.en: He knows everything about the supernatural.
translation.de: Er weiß alles über das Übernatürliche.

translation.en: If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.de: Wenn jemand weiß, was hier vor sich geht, dann Chatree.

translation.en: [in Thai] You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
translation.de: Du hast mich immer einen Scharlatan genannt.

translation.en: Uncle!
[in English] It's nice to meet everyone.
You all must be starving.
-[Zulu] 100% -[Lu Xin] How'd you know?
[Chatree] Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
[Kai] You are.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.de: Es ist mir eine Ehre, Sie als Gast zu haben.

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
translation.de: Was wissen Sie über Pan Gu?

translation.en: In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.de: In Thailand redet man nicht mit leerem Magen übers Geschäft.

translation.en: Is that a saying?
One that I just made up.
There are people after us.
There will always be people after you.
translation.de: Es wird immer Leute geben, die Sie jagen.

translation.en: Here we are well-protected.
We have weapons.
[grunts] Is this a prank?
[Chatree] No.
But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.de: Aber es ist lustig, dass es Ihr Armband ist.

translation.en: But it is not for you. You speak like Yoda, old man.
translation.de: -Aber es ist nicht für Sie bestimmt. -Sie reden wie Yoda.

translation.en: I am only 50. [chuckling]
Pan Gu.
Uncle.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.de: William Pan war nicht ganz ehrlich mit euch.

translation.en: Yeah? No shit.
Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.de: Pan und Ku An Qi sind entgegengesetzte Kräfte.

translation.en: and yang.
But they are not in opposition to each other.
translation.de: Sie stellen aber keinen Gegensatz dar.

translation.en: They are two halves of a whole.
translation.de: Sie sind zwei Hälften eines Ganzen.

translation.en: They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.de: durch all ihre Geburten, Leben, Tode und Wiedergeburten hindurch in Harmonie

translation.en: towards one goal,
reforming back to Pan Gu,
the first man.
And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.de: Und mit Hilfe ihrer Kräfte werden sie die Welt nach ihrem Bild umgestalten.

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
translation.de: Und nun, da das Dao gebrochen ist,

translation.en: they have the opportunity.
How will they do that?
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.de: Indem sie das Chi der Person nutzen, die sie gespalten hat.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.de: Beide haben jeweils ein Stück ihrer alten Essenz.

translation.en: The only constant they have, forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.de: Ihnen bleibt nur der Stein des Tempels, in dem sie gespalten wurden.

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.de: Schaffen sie es, die Teile mit Kais Chi aufzuladen,

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
I mean, it doesn't matter.
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.de: Wenn es zu Ku gehört, zerstören wir es…

translation.en: -[all yelling] -[Chatree] It can't be destroyed!
I've had quite enough, thank you.
This… This whole thing is just crazy. [sighs]
translation.de: Diese ganze Sache ist einfach verrückt.

translation.en: -[sighs] -You okay?
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
translation.de: Ich versuche nur, diesen übernatürlichen Kram

translation.en: this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.de: zu begreifen und das mit dem Ende der Welt.

translation.en: Yeah.
What did you do when you first found out?
translation.de: Was hast du getan, als du es erfahren hast?

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.de: Ich hatte gerade einen russischen Gangster erschossen.

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
Honestly?
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
translation.de: Ich habe mir einen fetten Drink genehmigt.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ugh. This is terrible.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.de: Der chinesische Whiskey aus der Brick Lane war schlimmer.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
translation.de: Ja. Aber das gehörte zum Job, also…

translation.en: -[sighs] -Is that what I was to you?
Just part of the job.
I can taste when you're lying.
[Chatree] My meditation is meditation.
-[Kai] You're not worried about us losing? -[Chatree] No, I'm not.
Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.de: Sollte das geschehen, würde Pan Gu die Welt neu gestalten.

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.de: Wir wären nur die vergessenen Träume eines Schmetterlings.

translation.en: Sounds peaceful.
But that is the one thing that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.de: Das ist eine Sache, die der Wu Assassin niemals haben kann.

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.de: Vielleicht hat er Freunde, die er nicht an sich ranlässt.

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them. [Chatree] You have lost one.
translation.de: -Ich muss sie beschützen. -Sie haben jemanden verloren.

translation.en: And now you're trying everything to avoid that pain again.
translation.de: Sie tun alles, damit Sie diesen Schmerz nie mehr erleben müssen.

translation.en: They're all I have left.
But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.de: Aber Pan Gu will alles kontrollieren.

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
We'll stop him.
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
translation.de: Wir halten ihn auf. Wir machen Pläne.

translation.en: There's a Jeep there.
There is the path that leads to the main road.
translation.de: Dort ist der Weg, der zur Hauptstraße führt.

translation.en: From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
translation.de: Vorn dort gelangt man leicht überallhin.

translation.en: You did not come here to train
translation.de: Sie sind nicht hier, um zu trainieren,

translation.en: or reflect.
You came here to leave
translation.de: Sie sind hier, um zu gehen,

translation.en: after everyone went to bed.
Last time I was here was, um…
ten years ago.
Family had a farm by the river.
translation.de: Meine Familie hatte eine Farm am Fluss.

translation.en: There was a bad flood.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.de: Das Wasser kam plötzlich, und einfach so

translation.en: my mum, my dad,
and my sister were gone.
No magical attack.
No clash for the world. It was, uh,
just an accident.
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.de: Ich kann meine Familie nicht zurückholen,

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.de: aber ich wollte, dass du Frieden mit Jen finden kannst.

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
translation.de: Wenigstens gibt es etwas, was du tun kannst.

translation.en: You have Kai,
Me…
I'm all alone.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know.
Well, you never asked.
This can't be real.
[Ku An Qi] It isn't.
[William] It's the version of the village in your mind
translation.de: Es ist die Version des Dorfes,

translation.en: from when you were a child.
translation.de: die du aus deiner Kindheit kennst.

translation.en: But we can make it like this again.
We can make it into whatever we want.
translation.de: Wir können daraus machen, was wir wollen.

translation.en: [William] Pan Gu is all.
[in Thai] Mum, Dad, Ratana!
-[chuckles] -[Ratana] I miss you.
[William] You can be together again… -[sniffles] -…forever.
translation.de: Ihr könnt wieder zusammen sein, für immer.

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
The Wu Assassin's Chi.
[whispering, echoing] It'll be easy.
-[in English] What are you doing? -I had no choice.
-What did they promise you? -[grunts]
Get up.
What's going on?
What do you think? [grunts]
I fuck with these.
-There's more down there. Let's go. -[Lu Xin] Yo! Tommy, hold up!
I'll get Preeya.
-What? -Be careful, okay?
I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
translation.de: Ich habe diese Scheiße langsam wirklich satt.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Tommy, get the Jeep.
We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here. Preeya betrayed us.
-No. She wouldn't. -What? She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
translation.de: -Nein. Niemals. -Sie hat Ku An Qis Kette.

translation.en: -Fuck. -Lu, get Zama. Tommy, the car!
-Hold on. We're stronger together. -Just do as I say!
Shit.
Oh shit.
[Lu Xin] Zama.
Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now. I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.de: -Preeya hinterging uns. Wir müssen weg. -Sie ging mit Pans Leuten weg. Komm.

translation.en: Calm down, boys.
All right. Let's go, guys!
[Zulu] Come on, let's go.
Come on, everybody in.
You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go! Don't let Pan Gu reform!
translation.de: Es ist nun in Ihren Händen. Los! Pan Gu darf nicht zurückkommen.

translation.en: -No! Chatree! -[Lu Xin] Get in the car!
-[Zulu] We need to go! -[Lu Xin] Drive, Tommy!
[Kai] We shouldn't have left Chatree.
translation.de: -Wir hätten ihn mitnehmen sollen. -Hättest auf mich hören sollen.

translation.en: -Should have listened to me. -There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.de: -Wir hätten ihn mitnehmen sollen. -Hättest auf mich hören sollen. Es gab nichts zu hören.

translation.en: -I made a decision. -Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
-I'm leading us. -No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.de: -Ich führe uns an. -Nein. Du schließt uns aus.

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
translation.de: Reden wir über unseren nächsten Schritt.

translation.en: I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.de: Moment mal. Du hältst dich da ganz raus.

translation.en: -What the fuck you talking about? -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.de: -Was redest du da? -Was ich da rede?

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.de: Deine kleine Freundin hat uns hintergangen.

translation.en: [Tommy] You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.de: Du hast auch Mist gebaut. Warst zu beschäftigt, Zama zu ficken.

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan? My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
translation.de: -Und du, Kai? Was war dein Plan? -Ich wollte Pan und Ku allein töten.

translation.en: -Like I should have done. -Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.de: -Das hätte ich tun sollen. -Toll. Du hast immer recht.

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you. True! I'm going myself.
translation.de: -Wir brauchen dich nicht. -Gut. Stimmt! Ich gehe allein.

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -[Zulu] Just stop it!
All of you. You're acting like little children.
translation.de: Ihr alle. Ihr verhaltet euch wie Kinder.

translation.en: Do I need to remind you
translation.de: Vergesst ihr, dass wir einen Gott daran hindern müssen,

translation.en: that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.de: Vergesst ihr, dass wir einen Gott daran hindern müssen, die Realität zu zerstören.

translation.en: You say you're a family.
You're not acting like a family,
not one that's about to save the world. Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.de: Nicht wie eine, die die Welt retten will. Ihr seid nicht einmal füreinander da.

translation.en: [Zulu] If you can…
just get over your anger…
your guilt…
Your ego.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.de: Dann hätten wir vielleicht eine Chance. Wirklich.

translation.en: So, let's remind ourselves.
Why are we here?
For Jenny.
She's right.
[sighs] We're all fucking idiots.
[Kai] No, no, no, no. No.
I'm the idiot.
I'm a fucking idiot.
[sighs] For Jenny.
-For Jenny. -For Jenny.
Now we're getting somewhere.
When we were at Pan's temple, I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.de: In Pans Tempel sah ich das Spaltsymbol auf einem Foto einer Ausgrabungsstätte.

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.de: Der Stein stammt von dort. Wir müssen dahin.

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like, they're gonna need your power.
translation.de: Nur eine Hälfte des Symbols ist bereit. Sie brauchen also deine Kraft.

translation.en: No. We shouldn't risk it.
No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.de: Denn sie werden uns alle jagen, wenn wir sie nicht aufhalten.

translation.en: This ends tonight.
If you all agree.
As long as we're smart about it.
You can count me in.
-We are all the Wu Assassins. -[chuckles]
Shit.
-Let's go kill a god. -[Tommy] Let's do it.
There are a lot of guards here.
[Tommy] They'll know we're coming.
They already know I'm here.
translation.de: Sie wissen, dass ich da bin.

translation.en: [Zulu] In that case…
-[gun cocks] -Boom.
[Ku An Qi] This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.de: Hier hat uns der erste Wu Assassin entzweit.

translation.en: [William] They'll be here soon.
[Ku An Qi] This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.de: Dieser Wu Assassin ist besonders schwer zu töten.

translation.en: I got this. [chuckles]
[Preeya] This thing killed my uncle.
translation.de: Dieses Ding hat meinen Onkel getötet.

translation.en: How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.de: Wer muss noch sterben, bevor ich meine Familie wieder habe?

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.de: Du siehst den Tod als das Ende, mein Kind.

translation.en: -You'll be with them soon enough. -[coughs]
[William] Along with all living things.
[Tommy] That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.de: Dort wird der Stein geschmolzen. Das sind die Schlafstätten.

translation.en: -Those are the main pressing machines. -[Lu Xin] How do you know?
[Tommy] Wikipedia.
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.de: Vorsicht, Leute. Sie brauchen dich noch für das Ritual…

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Get down! Move!
-What do you want to do? -We're splitting up.
Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.de: Wir trennen uns nicht wirklich, wir trennen sie.

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.de: Ich übernehme Zan. Lu, das Biest.

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
-[gunshot] -[Lu Xin] Fuck! Try this. It's got good range.
translation.de: -Scheiße! -Nimm den. Er hat eine gute Reichweite.

translation.en: -Be careful. -Okay.
[Kai] Zan!
[Lu Xin] Let's finish this.
I promised myself
translation.de: Ich vernichte alles aus der Zeit,

translation.en: I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.de: Ich vernichte alles aus der Zeit, als ich ein Bauernopfer deines Vaters war. Jenny war der Anfang.

translation.en: We started with Jenny.
translation.de: als ich ein Bauernopfer deines Vaters war. Jenny war der Anfang.

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
translation.de: Und es endet mit dir, Assassin.

translation.en: You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
translation.de: Du musst mit uns vorlieb nehmen, Bitch.

translation.en: The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.de: Die Kette ist nicht da. Ohne sie ist das alles sinnlos.

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.de: Sie sind nicht dumm. Gehen wir die anderen suchen.

translation.en: You fucking piece of shit.
-The fuck were you thinking? -Wait. No. Stop.
translation.de: -Was hast du dir dabei gedacht? -Warte. Nicht.

translation.en: Hey. [breathing heavily]
Tell me they mind-controlled you.
They told me I could see my family again,
translation.de: Sie sagten, ich könne meine Familie wiedersehen. Es war ein Fehler.

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
translation.de: Sie sagten, ich könne meine Familie wiedersehen. Es war ein Fehler. Es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: I messed up.
It's okay. It's okay.
Mastery over the body has its perks.
translation.de: Herrschaft über den Körper hat seine Vorzüge.

translation.en: [Preeya whispering] Fucking magic.
-[Kai] Give up. -[Zan] Never.
Get up!
[straining] This isn't for me.
translation.de: Das ist nicht nur für mich.

translation.en: This is for all of us.
[William] Welcome.
-Lu Xin! -[William] He'll be fine.
Your friends took out Ku.
But you
will not be so lucky.
[in deep voice] I am Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.de: Ich bin Pan Gu, der erste Mensch.

translation.en: Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.de: Kontrolle über Geist, Körper und Seele.

translation.en: Lu. Lu, wait. Hey.
Brother. It's not you!
-[Kai] Pan Gu! -[Lu Xin] Kai.
-What the fuck? -[groans]
The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.de: Das Problem ist, dass du nur ein Mann bist,

translation.en: while I am all.
Brother, I don't want to do this.
translation.de: Kumpel, ich will das nicht tun.

translation.en: [in demon voice] Thank you for your sacrifice.
No. No!
Lu! Lu! Lu!
Fight it.
We can't do this without you. Fight it, brother! Wake up!
translation.de: Wir schaffen das nicht ohne dich. Kämpf dagegen an! Wach auf.

translation.en: [Kai] Come on, Lu! Get up!
We need you, brother!
[Preeya grunting] Tommy.
-[Zulu] Come on. You can do it. -Fucking bitch.
I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
Let's go.
What the fuck happened?
translation.de: -Was zum Teufel war das? -Bist du das?

translation.en: Is that you? Hey.
translation.de: -Was zum Teufel war das? -Bist du das? Hey.

translation.en: Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.de: Natürlich bin ich es. Wer sonst?

translation.en: [chuckling] Nice.
Let's kill this motherfucker. Oh, fuck, yeah.
-[grunts] -Lu!
-Kai! -[Tommy] Lu, what's going on?
-[Kai] Ah, Lu! Ah! -It's sinking!
Grab that.
Kai! Heads up!
-I can't hold. -[Lu Xin] Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
translation.de: Ich kann nicht. Halt es fest, Kai!

translation.en: [Kai] Lu!
[Lu Xin] Stay there. Zama!
-Yeah? -Follow me.
Tie that!
Gotcha.
-This is serious, man. -No shit!
-You guys know knots? -We're about to find out.
translation.de: -Versteht ihr was von Knoten? -Sehen wir gleich.

translation.en: Girl Scout those ropes together.
[Tommy] We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.de: Wir holen sie damit hoch. Sag, wenn es lang genug ist.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Kai, this isn't working.
Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.de: -Mach was. Du bist der Wu Assassin. -Na los!

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
translation.de: -Mach was. Du bist der Wu Assassin. -Na los! Lass es ab!

translation.en: -Zama? -Almost there.
Let me know when you guys are good.
Start pulling!
Ah! It's about time.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
[grunting] Come on, Zama.
[Tommy] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
[Kai] It's over.
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.de: Ich kenne einen richtig netten, sicheren Weg nach draußen. Kommt.

translation.en: [Kai] Food's ready, guys.
Looks good.
Hold it, man. First, a toast.
translation.de: Warte mal. Einen Toast. Trinken wir

translation.en: To family. New and old.
[all] To family. Cheers!
To Jenny.
[all] To Jenny.
[Preeya] So, Kai, what's next? -I'm off to fight a necromancer. -Ooh!
translation.de: -Und, Kai. Was steht als Nächstes an? -Ich werde einen Nekromanten bekämpfen.

translation.en: I guess we're going on vacation then.
-We? I thought you could handle yourself. -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.de: Wir? Ich dachte… Wie jetzt? Du kriegst das hin.

translation.en: Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
translation.de: Nur weil ich es dir gezeigt habe,

translation.en: all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.de: was alle sahen, aber Schwamm drüber.

translation.en: -[Kai] You wanna spar? You wanna try me? -Do I want to spar?
I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
translation.de: Du bist der Wu Assassin. Ich nur der Lu Assassin.

translation.en: -[Tommy] You gonna let him say that? -Oh!
Okay. Okay.
-[Zulu] Oh my God. That's crazy. -[Tommy] Guys, guys, guys.
-[Tommy] Let's get him! -[Lu Xin] Ah!
-[Kai] Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Tommy] He's going in. Get him in the water.
translation.de: Er kommt ins Wasser. Rein mit ihm!
